title: Development of an Online Social Sciences Degree Program Using Collaborative Multimedia Design

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental online learning competencies and foundational understanding of social sciences
context.additional_context: Short intensive workshop developing online degree programs in social sciences through collaborative multimedia design in blended learning environments utilizing digital devices

learning_goals: Develop over three online lecture modules applying collaborative multimedia design processes
Demonstrate the ability to design learning materials using diverse digital tools (video, interactive content, simulations, etc.)
Complete multimedia content prototypes considering educational effectiveness through collaboration with members from other departments
Propose summative assessment plans according to evaluation design principles in online learning environments
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
